package.name: ontology_manager
package.description: An ontology manager node. It that encapsulates 3 logical blocks that realize the semantic anchoring stack. A knowledge base constituted by an ontology and its rules. A populator block that realizes the setup phase and adds individuals (ABoxes) to the knowledge base when this is out of the perception-component scope. A reasoner that discovers and makes explicit all implied information by terminology (TBox) and assertion (ABox) statements (and ensures the consistency of the ontology). All ontology manipulations rely on the Owlready2.
